name: MoonJumper (G0vinda, Seebass22)
description:
A 3D Jump 'n' Run:

Play as a passionate astronaut and jump around the moon. Beware, as the gravity is different than on earth...

We started creating this game at the Berlin Mini Jam (Themes: Moon,Space).

Credits:

  • Frederick Freund - Game Design / Programming
  • Sebastian Thümmel - Game Design / Programming
  • Jakob Frenzel - Music/Sound Design
  • Marc Ulherr - Music/Sound Design

Special Thanks to:

PULSAR BYTES for the cute Astronaut model: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/sci-fi/stylized-as...

and the amazing skybox:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox...

special note:

I did not create the cartoon "speachbubbles" nor do I own any rights for them.
